author: mwebb
msg: changed the data structure that is used to store the addresses that are to be blacklisted.  Using a thread-safe structure will prevent data corruption problems.  CopyOnWriteArrayList makes sense in that the majority of the time the list will be accessed and not changed which fits well with the design of the CopyOnWriteArrayList.

author: mwebb
msg: using HashMap could get this class into threading trouble.  Changed the type to the CopyOnWriteMap so that we can alleviate the potential for threading/concurrency problems.
